titleStmt.title: An abstract, of certain acts of parliament: of certaine her Maiesties iniunctions: of certaine canons, constitutions, and synodalles prouinciall: established and in force, for the peaceable gouernment of the Church, within her Maiesties dominions and countries, for the most part heretofore vnknowen and vnpractized
titleStmt.author: Stoughton, William, fl. 1584.

titleStmt.title: An abstract, of certain acts of parliament: of certaine her Maiesties iniunctions: of certaine canons, constitutions, and synodalles prouinciall: established and in force, for the peaceable gouernment of the Church, within her Maiesties dominions and countries, for the most part heretofore vnknowen and vnpractized
titleStmt.author: Stoughton, William, fl. 1584.

notesStmt.note: The first leaf and the last leaf are blank.
A reprint in STC 5819.5 is unpaginated.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
